name: TwitchTV Firefox Temp ScrollBar fix
description: TwitchTV recently changed on firefox to display ugly vertical toolbars, this style should remove them.
additional_info:
Sets right margin to -17px to hid the vertical scroll bar, horizontal scroll bar should not pop up because parent has overflow-x at hidden.

UPDATE (2017-01-30): It appears Twitch.TV has now fixed the issue. A firefox browser will have a negative -17px border on load on their webpages. You may notice the screen extends further to the right, disable this style and you should be good to go.
